backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles and read‑only phone/crypto report lookup tables.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing antifraud engine requirements, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files and their roles in the AntiFraud application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base with OKLCH color variables and dark‑mode theming for high accessibility.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, icons, manifest, and mounting the app root.
frontend/PHASE3A_READONLY_FRONTEND_NOCHA: Documentation confirming Phase 3a introduces a read‑only canister requiring zero frontend changes.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects known routes to the app shell while displaying a simple message.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and installation behavior.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling install, activate, and fetch events with cache‑first update behavior.
frontend/PWA_WEBAPK_ANDROID_TEST.md: Step‑by‑step checklist for verifying WebAPK installation behavior on Android Chrome.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application container handling routing, PWA setup, service worker registration, consent gate, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Defines the IDL service with a single analyzeText text‑to‑text function.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with navigation, header actions, and responsive mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/AuthControl.tsx: Handles user authentication UI, showing login or profile menu based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/CollaborativeRes: Displays collaborative fraud risk results including score, categories, and related alerts.
frontend/src/components/ConsentGateModal: Modal requiring acceptance of cookies and terms before proceeding, with navigation to legal pages.
frontend/src/components/DashboardQuickAc: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/InstallButton.ts: Button that triggers PWA installation and alerts if installation is not available.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown for selecting interface language from predefined options using the i18n provider.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallAction: Small action button that triggers PWA installation using localized text.
frontend/src/components/ReportSubmission: Dialog for submitting fraud reports with validation, rate limiting, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/StructuredAnalys: Shows structured fraud analysis results with risk level, explanation, and recommendation.
Displays logged-in user info, history entries with timestamps and types, and provides actions to clear history and log out.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAntiFraudActors.ts: Initializes main, extra, and reports canister actors based on identity and logs readiness once, exposing their loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useConsentGate.ts: Handles local-storage-based user consent checks and provides a method to mark consent as accepted.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, identity loading, and state transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Manages user-specific history stored per principal, allowing adding and clearing up to 50 recent items.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides translation context with language persistence in sessionStorage and access to translation strings.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains Portuguese translation strings for UI labels, sections, and app content.
frontend/src/ic/actors.ts: Creates IC canister actors (main, extra, reports) using a shared HTTP agent pointed to the IC mainnet.
frontend/src/ic/canisterIds.ts: Defines and exposes fixed canister IDs and a helper to retrieve them by type.
frontend/src/ic/idl/extra.idl.ts: Defines the Candid interface for the extra canister with phone and crypto report queries.
frontend/src/ic/idl/main.idl.ts: Defines the Candid interface for the main canister exposing a text analysis function.
frontend/src/ic/idl/reports.idl.ts: Defines Candid IDL types and service interface for submitting and looking up fraud reports and provides matching TypeScript types.
frontend/src/ic/readinessReport.ts: Builds and logs a readiness report showing canister IDs and which actor methods are available.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables, accessibility rules, and responsive touch targets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentationPage.tsx: Renders the documentation UI and triggers PDF generation while setting SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main verification UI allowing users to analyze messages, emails, phones, and crypto addresses and display structured results.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains verification methods using accordion sections and sets SEO metadata with defensive rendering.
frontend/src/pages/MissionPage.tsx: Renders the mission page with multiple institutional sections using translations, SEO metadata, and defensive paragraph rendering.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Displays the privacy policy with translated sections and SEO metadata, using a helper to safely render paragraph lists.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Shows terms and conditions content with translated sections, SEO setup, and fallback-safe paragraph rendering.
frontend/src/pwa/install.ts: Implements PWA install prompt handling, tracking install availability and triggering the deferred install event.
frontend/src/router/useSimpleRouter.ts: Provides a minimal client-side router using shared state, custom navigation events, and history API updates.
frontend/src/utils/antifraudTextNormaliz: Offers text normalization and keyword-matching utilities for accent-insensitive antifraud checks.
Builds structured documentation content using Portuguese translations for branding and institutional pages.
frontend/src/utils/emailHeuristics.ts: Runs deterministic email risk checks using suspicious patterns, domains, TLDs, and typosquatting detection.
frontend/src/utils/generateDocumentation: Builds a full text-based documentation file from structured content and triggers a client-side download.
frontend/src/utils/localRateLimit.ts: Implements a local cooldown system using localStorage to limit how often a report can be submitted.
frontend/src/utils/messageHeuristics.ts: Runs lightweight client-side scam detection using keyword weights, patterns, URLs, crypto addresses, and punctuation to compute a risk score.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Sets the document title and meta description at runtime with AntiFraud branding.
frontend/src/utils/structuredFraudAnalys: Provides structured, localized fraud-risk evaluation using deterministic rules and indicator templates.
frontend/src/utils/translateBackendResul: Translates backend-generated Portuguese analysis text into other languages using a dictionary-based replacer.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages per-user stored history and preferences in localStorage with load, save, and clear operations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended sizing, animations, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file outlining phased AntiFraud rollout, architectural constraints, PWA expectations, known issues, and installation‑flow replacement requirements.
